channel.title: ReaperXScape -Screw The Rest, Play The Best-
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/vYRQGwS.png[/img]
Hey moparians, i am the Owner of ReaperXScape allstar! i am here to advertise my server to get players.
first off, i would like to say that our forums are located at : www.reaperxscape.createaforum.com
the forums are crappy, but they will be improved
you can download the .jar client with the cache downloader here : https://www.dropbox.com/s/dmw7mdk9s7uyhiw/PlayerClient.jar
the server is hosted off hamachi as i am not able to portforward, depending on the server popularity and feedback, will descide if i get a vps!
so first : download hamachi here : https://secure.logmein.com/products/hamachi/download.aspx ** DOWNLOAD THE UNMANAGED VERSION ** then join one of the following hamachi networks : reaperxbeta1 reaperxbeta2 reaperxbeta3 reaperxbeta4 reaperxbeta5 reaperxbeta6 reaperxbeta7 reaperxbeta8
the passwords for all networks are : reap
~~~~~~~PICTURES~~~~~~~~~~~ [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/BZsruyI.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/sC7yzlO.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/uQnW9U0.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/47vylZ4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/iASC99J.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/iEqsyYp.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/RS5lxdj.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6AdSjN6.png[/img] _______________________________________________________________________________________________
ok, now for some server features...
[size=14pt]-made awesome quest tab[/size] quest tab features : [bosses] << click on this and it will show you the boss options with the boss maxhits! [boss drops] << find this from [bosses] tab, it will show you the items the bosses drop [quests] << wow! quests??? 4/7 quests made! [commands] << click the words in the tab to do the command [shops] << easyer then going to ::shops and looking for the shit you need [prestige] << click that to trade skills for prestige [summoning] << click here and you will see the summonable npcs [Settings] << click here and change some server settings (xplock and yell censor) [Player Info] << click here to view various player info
[size=14pt]~~~~~~~Other Features~~~~~~~~[/size] -new funpk! when you kill somebody at funpk they lose no items, and they will drop a good random item, or bones (more then likely) -every 20 minutes ingame you automatically receive 1gp - 200mgp -jar client (easy to use) -random events (being worked on) every couple mins, a random event comes, to stop stupid auto clicks! -new home area -yell titles (::titles to see the list ingame) -made antiSYI to block nulls/crashes or whatever SYI is... -working clan chats -when you kill a boss and get an item (except coins or bones) it sends a message to all players online of the drop! -working bank pins (they just dont save, i messed up my saving methods (being worked on)) -made 4 quests [the noclip tragedy], [the blood diamond], [the ice diamond], [excalibur ownage]. -void minigame -90% creds to owner of futurescape! -working dices (50x2, 70x3, 85x5) -dicer npc, enter the amount of 1b tickets to bet! -rares area! (drops are shouted to all players) -skill exp lamps (gives lvl 125 in random skill) -working and accurate boss drops (works for all bosses) -whenever you achieve lvl 125 in a skill, you get a mystery box (mystery box gives a random custom) -when you kill the custom dropping boss, he drops a custom 1/15 chance, so its rare -added super boss (drops pumpkin and rogue armour) -pumpkin heals 125 hp, and you can use infinity times (rare drop and super hard!) -rogue armour = very strong and when you wear the whole set you get + 150 maxhit -spined armour gives +120 maxhit -bandos, skeletal and armadyl armour sets being worn give bonus maxhits also -no more shops for bandos or armadyl -bandos armadyl and all other strong items are obtained from bosses -no more rares shops, rares are collectibles and not sellable to shops! -click the skills box on skills tab for quick chat skill levels! -*added command ::copy for admins, copy the armour that other players wear! -*added working flower game (with flower picking up) -*added summoning -*all boss areas are now safe zones -*new skills area -*most of the messages arnt as colorful and not as much distracting -*fixed messages sent after you get a rare drop -*woodcutting for logs instead of cash -*mining gives random ores -*fixed funpk and dying methods -*added mithril seeds as boss drops -*Working Runecrafting (at the abyss) -*Better XP lamps, normal 1 gives 500k xp, antique lamp gives 500k X your level in the skill -*You Can Only Open The Shops In The Quest Tab When Not In Combat -*::Bank For Mods Only Now -*New Mining Area -*Removed all ways to get customs, now you must get archery tickets (not yet descided how to achieve them) and then buy the customs at the shops at home. -::alchprice (itemid) tells you the amount the item will alch for, get nats from rcing -removed unnecessary commands -added barrows - 60% complete (will be finished today) -reduced colors in the sendMessages, because to much color is annoying and ugly. - so much more that i cant think about rofl... -added real barrows (100% working) -added raffle system (winner gets picked every 30 mins) __________________________________________________________________________________________________________ [size=14pt]~~~~~~~Skilling Updates~~~~~~~[/size]
-thieving cash amounts reduced (depends on the stall, silk stall gives a max of 7m (random amount)) -herblore chest opens herblore shop to buy herbs and ingrediants (100% herblore) -firemaking chest gives (50k Gp (X) Your FireMaking Level) -max reward : 6.25m -slayer chest gives (50k Gp (X) Your Slayer Level) -max reward : 6.25m -agility pipe gives (50k Gp (X) Your agility level Level) -max reward : 6.25m -thieving lamp and casket amounts reduced -new skills area -new way of mining (you get a random ore) -new crafting (kitchen drawers give a random uncut gem and you can cut them for xp according to how good the gem is and you can sell the CUT gems to the skills shop) -new woodcutting (chop trees for logs, gonna take logs out of shops so people have to wc for fletching) -Dungeoneering -added custom skill called minigaming, complete minigames for level ups (this skill increases combat level) -most skills are working
__________________________________________________________________________________________________________

@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

[quote=“reaperxscape2, post:16, topic:520512”]im not very good at making my own texts, and the button was my first ever gfx made with photoshop, thats why i put it there, and i like it
edit * changed background[/quote]
Also, don’t put who’s the owner is and whatever the raffle is either. You can include that information in-game.

item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

reaperxscape2:

uhmmmmmmmmmm what do u see from your server dumbass? all my ideas i had for long times, and all i have from you is your gay little “void minigame” so maybe you should stfu about people “copying” your ideas and go die in a whole with your source. your just jelly…

So… You’re acting like you’re great yet you need Hamachi to host your server?

Read full topic

item.title: ReaperXScape -Screw The Rest, Play The Best-
item.dc:creator: @xI_c_E xI c E
item.description:
@xI_c_E wrote:

I see a lot of modified things that are clearly from mine, so don’t act stupid. People who have played mine will also say the same thing. Why would I be jealous of these ideas when they’re clearly modified versions of MY ideas? I wouldn’t care if there’s a few but seriously, it gets to a point when it’s pathetic to start seeing this happen a lot.

Read full topic

item.title: ReaperXScape -Screw The Rest, Play The Best-
item.dc:creator: @reaperxscape2 reaperxscape2
item.description:
@reaperxscape2 wrote:

Hey moparians, i am the Owner of ReaperXScape allstar!
i am here to advertise my server to get players.

first off, i would like to say that our forums are located at : www.reaperxscape.createaforum.com

the forums are crappy, but they will be improved

you can download the .jar client with the cache downloader here :

Dropbox

Dropbox - Error

Dropbox is a free service that lets you bring your photos, docs, and videos anywhere and share them easily. Never email yourself a file again!

the server is hosted off hamachi as i am not able to portforward, depending on the server popularity and feedback, will descide if i get a vps!

so first : download hamachi here : https://secure.logmein.com/products/hamachi/download.aspx
** DOWNLOAD THE UNMANAGED VERSION **
then join one of the following hamachi networks :
reaperxbeta1
reaperxbeta2
reaperxbeta3
reaperxbeta4
reaperxbeta5
reaperxbeta6
reaperxbeta7
reaperxbeta8

the passwords for all networks are : reap

~PICTURES~~~~~

BZsruyI.png783×541



47vylZ4.png782×539

iASC99J.png776×539



6AdSjN6.png778×539

ok, now for some server features…

[size=14pt]-made awesome quest tab[/size]
quest tab features :
[bosses] << click on this and it will show you the boss options with the boss maxhits!
[boss drops] << find this from [bosses] tab, it will show you the items the bosses drop
[quests] << wow! quests??? 4/7 quests made!
[commands] << click the words in the tab to do the command
[shops] << easyer then going to ::shops and looking for the shit you need
[prestige] << click that to trade skills for prestige
[summoning] << click here and you will see the summonable npcs
[Settings] << click here and change some server settings (xplock and yell censor)
[Player Info] << click here to view various player info

[size=14pt]~Other Features~~[/size]
-new funpk! when you kill somebody at funpk they lose no items, and they will drop a good random item, or bones (more then likely)
-every 20 minutes ingame you automatically receive 1gp - 200mgp
-jar client (easy to use)
-random events (being worked on) every couple mins, a random event comes, to stop stupid auto clicks!
-new home area
-yell titles (::titles to see the list ingame)
-made antiSYI to block nulls/crashes or whatever SYI is…
-working clan chats
-when you kill a boss and get an item (except coins or bones) it sends a message to all players online of the drop!
-working bank pins (they just dont save, i messed up my saving methods (being worked on))
-made 4 quests [the noclip tragedy], [the blood diamond], [the ice diamond], [excalibur ownage].
-void minigame -90% creds to owner of futurescape!
-working dices (50x2, 70x3, 85x5)
-dicer npc, enter the amount of 1b tickets to bet!
-rares area! (drops are shouted to all players)
-skill exp lamps (gives lvl 125 in random skill)
-working and accurate boss drops (works for all bosses)
-whenever you achieve lvl 125 in a skill, you get a mystery box (mystery box gives a random custom)
-when you kill the custom dropping boss, he drops a custom 1/15 chance, so its rare
-added super boss (drops pumpkin and rogue armour)
-pumpkin heals 125 hp, and you can use infinity times (rare drop and super hard!)
-rogue armour = very strong and when you wear the whole set you get + 150 maxhit
-spined armour gives +120 maxhit
-bandos, skeletal and armadyl armour sets being worn give bonus maxhits also
-no more shops for bandos or armadyl
-bandos armadyl and all other strong items are obtained from bosses
-no more rares shops, rares are collectibles and not sellable to shops!
-click the skills box on skills tab for quick chat skill levels!
-*added command ::copy for admins, copy the armour that other players wear!
-*added working flower game (with flower picking up)
-*added summoning
-*all boss areas are now safe zones
-*new skills area
-*most of the messages arnt as colorful and not as much distracting
-*fixed messages sent after you get a rare drop
-*woodcutting for logs instead of cash
-*mining gives random ores
-*fixed funpk and dying methods
-*added mithril seeds as boss drops
-*Working Runecrafting (at the abyss)
-*Better XP lamps, normal 1 gives 500k xp, antique lamp gives 500k X your level in the skill
-You Can Only Open The Shops In The Quest Tab When Not In Combat
-::Bank For Mods Only Now
-*New Mining Area
-*Removed all ways to get customs, now you must get archery tickets (not yet descided how to achieve them) and then buy the customs at the shops at home.
-::alchprice (itemid) tells you the amount the item will alch for, get nats from rcing
-removed unnecessary commands
-added barrows - 60% complete (will be finished today)
-reduced colors in the sendMessages, because to much color is annoying and ugly.

  • so much more that i cant think about rofl…
    -added real barrows (100% working)
    -added raffle system (winner gets picked every 30 mins)

[size=14pt]~Skilling Updates~[/size]

-thieving cash amounts reduced (depends on the stall, silk stall gives a max of 7m (random amount))
-herblore chest opens herblore shop to buy herbs and ingrediants (100% herblore)
-firemaking chest gives (50k Gp (X) Your FireMaking Level) -max reward : 6.25m
-slayer chest gives (50k Gp (X) Your Slayer Level) -max reward : 6.25m
-agility pipe gives (50k Gp (X) Your agility level Level) -max reward : 6.25m
-thieving lamp and casket amounts reduced
-new skills area
-new way of mining (you get a random ore)
-new crafting (kitchen drawers give a random uncut gem and you can cut them for xp according to how good the gem is and you can sell the CUT gems to the skills shop)
-new woodcutting (chop trees for logs, gonna take logs out of shops so people have to wc for fletching)
-Dungeoneering
-added custom skill called minigaming, complete minigames for level ups (this skill increases combat level)
-most skills are working

Read full topic
item.source: ReaperXScape -Screw The Rest, Play The Best-
